summary: A collection of unitâ€‘test modules that verify the correctness of various Qiskit conversion utilities, ensuring that transformations between QuantumCircuit objects and representations such as DAG, DAGDependency, DAGDependencyV2, Gate, and Instruction preserve calibrations, metadata, wire ordering, and functional behavior across edge cases.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable and accurate conversion of quantum circuit data structures within the Qiskit ecosystem, supporting downstream quantum algorithm development and execution by validating structural fidelity and metadata integrity.
